## Mapa de gastos presuntamente ilegítimos

```{r, echo=FALSE}
require(leaflet)
m <- leaflet() %>%
  setView(lng=-3.70453, lat=40.41358, zoom = 12) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng= -3.719815, lat=40.400207, popup="M-30") %>%
  addMarkers(lng= -3.684453, lat=40.368941, popup="Caja Mágica") %>%
  addMarkers(lng= -3.711719, lat=40.398063, popup="Pasarela Perault")
m
```
